description: The observed symptom involves Windows Server 2012 R2 not displaying certain updates, such as the Security Monthly Quality Rollup for November (KB5033420) and December (KB5033249), as needed in Windows Server Update Services (WSUS). This issue raises concerns regarding the end of life status of Windows Server 2012 R2, which could affect the availability of updates in the WSUS console. Even though these updates are present in the Microsoft Update Catalog, they are not appearing under the necessary category in WSUS, causing potential delays in critical security patches being applied.
